description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 21/01951/FUL (Demolition of existing offices and erection of 5 storey registered care home for the elderly (Use Class C2) including the provision of parking, landscaping, revisions to access and all other associated works including parking provision, cycle parking and refuse/recycling facilities) to amend substation outbuilding, landscaping, screen on roof plan and brick details on elevation
decision_conditions: The following approved plans listed under Condition 1 of planning permission ref: 21/01951/FUL:- AA8812_2006_P1_GROUND_FLOOR_PLAN-4867623- A100415_2006_P1_PROPOSED_GROUND_FLOOR_PLAN- AA8812_2008_P1_SECOND_FLOOR_PLAN-4867622- AA8812_2009_P1_THIRD_FLOOR_PLAN-4867625- AA8812_2010_P1_FOURTH_FLOOR_PLAN-4867624- AA8812_2011_P1_ROOF_PLAN-4867632- AA8812_2015_P1_ELEVATIONS_1_OF_2-4867626- AA8812_2016_P1_ELEVATIONS_2_OF_2-4867627- AA8812-6062_RevT_02-Brick_Panel_Details_Sheet_02-5365267Are replaced by:- A100415_2006_P2_PROPOSED_GROUND_FLOOR_PLAN- A100415_2007_P2_PROPOSED_FIRST_FLOOR_PLAN- A100415_2008_P2_PROPOSED_SECOND_FLOOR_PLAN- A100415_2009_P2_PROPOSED_THIRD_FLOOR_PLAN- A100415_2010_P2_PROPOSED_FOURTH_FLOOR_PLAN- A100415_2011_P2_PROPOSED_ROOF_PLAN- A100415_2015_P4_PROPOSED_ELEVATIONS_1_OF_2- A100415_2016_P2_PROPOSED_ELEVATIONS_2_OF_2- A100415-AC - 6062  - P02 - Brick Panel Details Sheet 02 - PROPOSEDAdditional drawings hereby approved as part of condition 1:- A100415 - Ewell Rd - Surbiton Care Home -Landscape Proposals- A100415-AC - 2051  - P02 - Brick detailing Ewell Road facade- A100415-AC-Signature Surbiton - Changes to Landscape, Outbuilding, Brick Details
